item.description: 1.63.0 (2022-08-11) # Language # Remove migrate borrowck mode for pre-NLL errors. Modify MIR building to drop repeat expressions with length zero. Remove label/lifetime shadowing warnings. Allow explicit generic arguments in the presence of impl Trait args. Make cenum_impl_drop_cast warnings deny-by-default. Prevent unwinding when -C panic=abort is used regardless of declared ABI. lub: don’t bail out due to empty binders. Compiler # Stabilize the bundle native library modifier, also removing the deprecated static-nobundle linking kind.

1.64.0 (Unreleased) # Implement network primitives with ideal Rust layout, not C system layout Stabilize let_chains in Rust 1.64 Warn about dead tuple struct fields Utilize PGO for windows x64 rustc dist builds Implement fmt::Write for OsString allow unions with mutable references and tuples of allowed types Stabilize core::ffi:c_* and rexport in std::ffi Remove restrictions on compare-exchange memory ordering. Stabilize Windows FileTypeExt with is_symlink_dir and is_symlink_file Let rust-analyzer ship on stable, non-preview Stabilize into_future relate closure_substs.
1.65.0 (Unreleased) # consider unnormalized types for implied bounds
